snippet.title: Battle Knights Trailer
snippet.description:
Battle Knights is a cooperative platformer which features a diverse selection of levels in story mode and a hectic versus mode. Can you battle through and unite the Realms Of Color?

Developed by Mire Studios: http://www.mirestudios.com

Music by Deepwise: http://www.deepwise.net

Xbox One page: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/battle-knights/BV58251XZ2HD

Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/493000/
